quickStart.title: What Can FonPick Help You With?

items.question: How is the market today?
items.answer: Market Regime tells market sentiment - Risk-On (bold to invest) or Risk-Off (cautious)

items.question: What are big investors doing?
items.answer: Smart Money tracks smart money - Foreign and Institution buying or selling

items.question: Which sectors should I focus on?
items.answer: Sector Analysis shows which sectors are interesting and which to avoid

items.question: Which stocks are interesting?
items.answer: Daily Focus shows stocks mentioned in multiple areas - High conviction picks

content.dataSource: Data from SET + NVDR (Smart Money flow)

noData.title: Why is data sometimes not displayed?

priorityOrder.title: What should I focus on first?

priorities: P0 (Market Regime + Smart Money) → Decide before investing

content.advantage: They have more money and information than retail investors, so following them usually gives good results

content.riskOnDesc: Investors bold to take risk, economy is good
content.riskOffDesc: Investors afraid, avoiding risk, economy uncertain

contradiction.title: If Smart Money buys but market falls?

possibilities: Accumulation phase - Smart Money accumulating, waiting to rise
Bottom fishing - Smart Money thinks market is too cheap
Divergence - Beware, there may be more downside
content.advice: In this case, wait for clear signals before deciding
